titleStmt.title: A confutation of atheisme by Iohn Doue Doctor of Diuinitie. The contents are to be seene in the page following
titleStmt.author: Dove, John, 1560 or 61-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde for Henry Rockett, and and are to be sold at the long shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the long shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultry
